fullplot: After nearly fifteen years behind bars, lefty revolutionary Bruno escapes and heads back to Grenoble, France. His plan? Settle some old scores, hook up with his foxy ex-lover, and avoid the cop on his tail. An unexpected event, however, brings cop and crook closer than they ever could have expected.

title: One

tomatoes.consensus: Gripping, fast moving thriller. Best seen with the other parts of the trilogy.
